created_by: E.M. Anhaus (originally from Atomic Blue Detections, Endgame), oscd.community
name: Interactive AT Job
description: Detect an interactive AT job, which may be used as a form of privilege escalation.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\at.exe AND process.command_line:*interactive*)`
